horrendous

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: [Sorcery_Society] events in the US
messages.msgSnippet: I can only agree with my comrade Kagemaru. These are cowardly people and punishment is inevitable..But we must remember to offer prayers, light incense or
messages.messageBody:
I can only agree with my comrade Kagemaru. These are cowardly people and
punishment is inevitable..But we must remember to offer prayers, light
incense or anything relevant, for the hope that the thousends of dead in New
York and Washington D.C. will rest in peace. My heart goes out to all
involved and my prayers are with you if you lost relatives in the horrendous
and despicable events of yesterday morning.
Namu Amida Butsu. Namu Amida Butsu, Namu Amida Butsu...............R.I.P.
Ben Sharples
United Kingdom.

messages.subject: Re: [Sorcery_Society] events in the US
messages.msgSnippet: A moment of silence if you will, for the thousands that may have died in the recent events that rocked the U.S. yesterday morning at 08:43 hrs. I was watching
messages.messageBody:
A moment of silence if you will, for the thousands that may have died in the
recent events that rocked the U.S. yesterday morning at 08:43 hrs. I was
watching live as the second plane appeared. The whole of my country is
shocked. A prayer for all the souls from Ireland.

Kagemaru.
